attributes.action: Grant asylum to any refugees fleeing war in Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: We have a responsibility to stand up for those brutalised by autocrats, and to find ways to help the people of Ukraine that are not simply based around military escalation
attributes.background: Any civilians or conscientious objectors who are escaping violence in Ukraine must be granted residence and protection in the UK

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
